item.title: Jeff Hiller Confesses RuPaul Is the Celebrity He Most Wants to Meet at His First Emmys
item.description: The ‘Somebody Somewhere’ star also talks about landing his first nomination and hopes for a future of non-cookie-cutter roles.

item.title: ‘Somebody Somewhere’ Co-Writer Bridget Everett About Telling a Story of Friendship in the Series Finale
item.description: “It’s very special that the two of them are still the center of each other’s universe,” Everett says of the relationship between her character, Sam, and Jeff Hiller’s Joel.
